Message:
I can’t...breathe...!
Lucille...!
Why is this happening...
right as I finally
get you back...?!

Suddenly, two ice-cold hands
pulled my face close...
and something brushed
against my lips.

Through the bubble of air
Lucille breathed into me,
I felt like I could hear her voice.

As I swallowed it,
Lucille looked relieved,
and slowly closed her eyes...

I frantically squeezed her hand.
But, it only remained limp
in my grasp...

Before I knew it,
I found myself up on
the surface of the lake,
holding the now cold body
of Lucille in my arms.

No, that’s not true...
Because this time,
I’m the one who...!

Just then, a bubble floating
beside me popped,
and I heard a voice ring out.
The voice of my own heart,
now screaming with hate.

“Yes... If only
I’d recognized the truth sooner...

You were right all along, Lucille...
Humans will never accept witches.

The rift between us
is far too deep to ever
understand one another.”

“I’ll become
what you all want...
What you all loathe...

A full-blooded witch,
out to destroy this world!”
